---
title: "Mediation confound"
output: html_notebook
---



```{r}
n <- 1000
treat   <- rbinom(n, 1, .5)
med_out_confound <- rnorm(n, 0, 2)
med     <- treat + med_out_confound + rnorm(n, 0, 1)
out     <- treat + med_out_confound + rnorm(n, 0, 1)
```


```{r}
boxplot(out ~ treat)
```


```{r}
plot(out ~ med)
```




```{r}
boxplot(med ~ treat)
```



```{r}
out <- med
med <- treat
```
